description:
A new highly difficult gathering area will be added to the final section of the game. Also, new events related to the gathering area will be added. The monsters that appear in the gathering area are stronger than those from other maps, and an extremely powerful monster resides there as well.
Note: The events added in this content do not include any voice.

Note: This product is included in the Season Pass.  Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
name: "Secret Solitary Island"
